message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Your price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we say $110 for the product?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $90, but that's my absolute limit.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about we say $100 for the product?
I'm really trying to make this work, but $100 is still more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $95, but I can't go any higher.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but that's as low as I can go
